content: धुक्ष् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (धुक्षते, धुक्षित) {@--1@} To be kindled. {@--2@} To live. {@--3@} To be weary. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (धुक्षयति-ते) To kindle, inflame. --WITH सं to be kindled or excited (<ab>fig.</ab> also); संदुधुक्षे तयोः कोपः <ls>Bk. 14. 109.</ls> ({%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%}) to kindle, inflame, excite; निवार्णभूयिष्ठमथास्य वीर्यं संधुक्षयंतीव वपुर्गुणेन <ls>Ku. 3. 52.</ls>
